docs.snippet: President Xi Jinping has not wavered from his view that destabilizing the North would create chaos in the region, scholars and officials said....
docs.lead_paragraph: President Xi Jinping has not wavered from his view that destabilizing the North would create chaos in the region, scholars and officials said.
docs.abstract: American and Chinese foreign policy experts say Pres Xi Jinping's reluctance to impose crippling punishments on North Korea over its nuclear tests is due to his belief that destabilizing North would throw region into chaos.

headline.main: After Nuclear Test, China Resists Pressure to Curb North Korea
headline.print_headline: China Resists Pressure to Curb North Koreans

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: Far East, South and Southeast Asia and Pacific Areas

byline.contributor: Yufan Huang and Zhang Tiantian contributed research.

docs.snippet: The United Nations' nuclear watchdog confirmed on Saturday that Iran had curbed its nuclear program as agreed with world powers, paving the way for most international sanctions against Tehran to be lifted....
docs.lead_paragraph: The United Nations' nuclear watchdog confirmed on Saturday that Iran had curbed its nuclear program as agreed with world powers, paving the way for most international sanctions against Tehran to be lifted.

headline.main: Factbox: Lifting Sanctions on Iran-How It Will Work
headline.print_headline: Factbox: Lifting Sanctions on Iran-How It Will Work
